text: "(It's Gonna Be a) Lonely Christmas" is a Christmas song recorded by The Orioles in 1948. It was their second hit (following "It's Too Soon to Know"), reaching position #8 on Billboard’s Juke Box charts in December 1948, and #5 the following Christmas.CD liner notes: Billboard Greatest R&B; Christmas Hits, 1990, Rhino Records ==References== Category:American Christmas songs Category:Songs about loneliness Category:1948 songs
title: (It's Gonna Be a) Lonely Christmas
